title: Match
description: A sport's match between two opponents.

id.description: A compound id consisting of team names and match time (e.g., ['san_francisco', 'cleveland', 1449980426]).

items.description: Away team's name/city/state (not nickname) in lower case and trimmed.
Home team's name/city/state (not nickname) in lower case and trimmed.

board.description: An array of odds from different sources for this match.

sport.description: The sport being played (e.g., NFL, NCAAB, etc.).

time.description: Timestamp (in seconds) of when the match occurs.

created.description: Timestamp (in seconds) when odds were created in the database.

updated.description: Timestamp (in seconds) when odds were last updated in the database.
